segments.text: Peeking into this scene, I see the sink area first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's running unchecked, filling and then overflowing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, completely zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the growing puddle; how does she not feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked neatly on the counter beside her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a pretty garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a fence look so orderly out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the upper cabinets are open to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stretches up on a shaky two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies, balancing a plate too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could tip and spill everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, reaching for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, the little mischief-makers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage is going to be a nightmare.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope this ends without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
